aircraft.value: Cyclops Vision - AC-6452-304 at Training Center Alpha

defect_observed.value: Tail assembly rivet loosening. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 03/07/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 04/07/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 07/07/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 07/07/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 09/07/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
